data.name: Eternal Pinball RPG
data.detailed_description:
Could I interest you in a Quest? We are looking for heroes that jump into this grand adventure.


Play this unique pinball table to climb the online leaderboards or beat your personal highscore. But how about playing an RPG while you're at it? Earn experience for quests and find the most epic loot to bolster your character. The stronger you get the higher scores you'll be able to push.
Only the bravest heroes dare to enter the special dungeon table but they are rewarded plentiful with rare artifacts for their collection. There's no level cap or shortage of enemies to fight and items to loot... the fun never stops!

Eternal Pinball RPG comes with the following features:
  • 13 different quest types
  • Tons of enemies and items
  • Skill point system for level-ups
  • Artifact collection with unique bonus effects
  • Unlockable dungeon table with custom quest-line
  • Merchant that sells valuable chests
  • Offline and Online Highscores
  • Achievements
  • Multi Ball

So what are you waiting for? Be the hero!

data.short_description: Level up and equip your hero in this unique Pinball-RPG mashup. Beat everybody on the online leaderboards and unlock the dungeon table to find rare artifacts to complete your collection.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2120 / AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 460 (1GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB) / Intel® Iris Pro™ 580 / Intel® Iris® Plus G7 / AMD® Radeon™ Vega 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
